DOC.brief_summary: PCO patient assess clinically , urine & blood sample test . Systolic & diastolic blood pressure , serum glucose & insulin level , lipid profile , C-reactive protein , complete hormonal profile , Urinary albumin excretion measure .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risks Urinary Albumin Excretion ( UAE ) Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome ( PCO )
DOC.detailed_description: PCO patient 2 3 criterion : oligo- anovulation ; hyperandrogenism & polycystic ovary . Exclusion criterion : pregnancy , diabetes , hypertension , adrenal & thyroid dysfunction . Blood sample overnight fast ( 8hrs ) day 2 3 menstrual cycle . Serum concentration follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , prolactin , total testosterone & sex hormone bind globulin , serum 17-hydroxy ( OH ) progesterone & dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate measure . Oral glucose tolerance test & plasma insulin level measure . Total cholesterol , triglyceride , high & low density lipoprotein . Urinary albumin measure & data analyse .
DOC.criteria: PCO patient pregnancy diabetes hypertension adrenal dysfunction thyroid dysfunction
